import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import WebFont from "webfontloader"; import data from "./data.json"; import "../../scss/base.scss"; import "../../scss/intro.scss"; import "../../scss/play.scss"; import "../../scss/work.scss"; export const Home = () => { const loadWebFonts = (cb) => { try { WebFont.load({ google: { families: ["Arvo", "Source Sans Pro"], }, active: cb, inactive: cb, }); } catch (e) { console.error("Error loading web fonts."); } }; useEffect(() => { loadWebFonts(() => {}); }, []); return ( <>

Hi there!

I'm Shekhar Khedekar.

I'm a front-end engineer at{" "} Shocase {" "} and a percussionist, cyclist, and home-brewer.

If you'd like to get in touch, email me, connect on{" "} LinkedIn, or find me on{" "} Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram .

Download Resume

{i.content}
))}
))}

  • {a}

))} website»
))}
))}
); };
